inclusion.criterion: Anemia by functional martial deficiency (as defined in the NCCN2016 recommendations)
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient with chronic renal failure with an estimation of renal filtration rate according to the formula CKD-EPI < 60 ml/min/1.73 m².
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient is a 24-year-old man who has had type 1 diabetes for 11 years and presents with hyperglycemia and concern for possible diabetic ketoacidosis.
